reviews.text: Delicious and healthy lunch. I loved it, full of veges and chicken in a rich curry, coconut milk sauce. Fabulous cinnamon iced tea. Gracious and friendly service. Fun atmosphere. Will be back again and again!

In a city with abundant good eating places, the Rainbow remains our hands down first choice year after year. Delicious choices for both vegetarians and meat eaters. Breakfast and lunch only and both menus sport excellent choices. Great friendly service, warm cozy brick building with charming interior (formerly a bank with the vault still visible).One of the best if not THE best patio in town. Love love love it.

I was told this was a  vegetarian spot, so wasn't stoked at first. Then I found out they are more than willing to add bacon to anything. Everything I had was incredible! I tried everyone else's food, and my Benedict was incredible! Their pumpkin something pancakes were to die for and made great French toast sticks the next morning. Can't wait to try more of their food!

I’ve loved this place for a long time and have been many many times. Recently however, I’ve taken a break since there is a lot of inconsistency with their food quality and playing, though service is almost always great! This is the reason for 4 stars instead of 5. 

I really want this to be my favorite breakfast restaurant in Fort Collins, perhaps if they can improve consistency this will happen. Either way, I highly recommend you give it a try if you haven’t!

This locally owned restaurant is what Fort Collins is all about! Amazing food. Great people. Excellent service. The outside patio is gorgeous-surrounded by trees and little vegetable gardens. I love it!

I always go there for their chocolate pastries..... best they have is choco fantasy.... enjoy it hot with scoop of vanilla ice-cream..... must try when you visit there.... other things are also good there.... like their sandwiches and coffes and other cold beverages........
I love this place... Visiting this since 2012... Yes.. best things do happen over a cup of coffee...  Lots of memories for lifetime...
A nice place if you want to spend time leisurely. ( without spending too much) Ps: We ordered only a tea and coffee so no comments about the food. Service was fine.

Awesome beverage as well as food of CCD. 
Well coordinated staff ...................
Nice place to enjoy coffee. Good Environment
